name: Heartless reseller is Roguelike
description:
Roguelike action unfolds in supermarkets!
this roguelike action game.
We aim at the back of the dungeon while collecting various "resale items" in the supermarket.
If you have some "resale items", the enemy "resale rogue" will attack the player and try to steal the "resale items". Timing is also important.
Conversely, you can attack the "resale rogue" and seize "resale items".
"Resale items" can also be given to troubled "general people".
As you continue to take away "resale items" from "general people" and steal toilet paper from the toilet, the strong enemy "messenger of hell" will come to judge you.
In the back of the dungeon, the BOSS awaits. The BOSS will be a different character depending on your actions.
Depending on your actions, the future diverges and you can see multiple endings.

------------------STORY-------------------

In 20XX, in times of calamity, grasshoppers covered the sky, and illness afflicted people.
In addition, the "resale rogue", which takes advantage of people's anxiety and buys daily necessities and resells it at a high price, is overflowing.
As a single "resale rogue",
To get a mask, toilet paper, canned food, and pasta, I boarded a supermarket “random” where the arrangement changed every time I entered.
The enemy "resale rogues" will relentlessly target your cart! !
Are you really happy by buying products?
Depending on your actions, the future diverges and you can see multiple endings.
Are you a rogue? Or ...
You're the morality tested now

The expected clear time is about 1 hour.

All locations, names, organizations, and occupations represented in this work are fictional.
Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
